name: Spatium Inter Nos
description:
2 convicts, 1 tether Coop or die

                    


Spatium Inter Nos is a cooperative space adventure filled with puzzles and platforms in 2.5D. As players, you will take on the role of two prisoners, a human and an alien connected by an anti-escape tether. The impact of an asteroid to your space prison presents a window of opportunity for both of you to escape. Only with good communication and teamwork will you and your partner be able to overcome the obstacles that lie between you and the freedom you’ve so longed for. Will you be able to survive the game in one piece? Co-op game - Play local or online. Two is better than one! Share your adventures with a friend.   Challenging zero gravity - Control and synchronize your movements with those of your partner: this is key to achieve your goal.   Ingenious puzzles - Deal with deadly laser traps which will test your skills and mental agility. 


    Keyboard (option 1): Keyboard (option 2): Controller:

 

This game is still in development, your suggestions in the comments section will help us improve the game and give it the finishing touches it deserves.  If you find any bugs in the gameplay, please let us know, and our army of skilled programmers will eradicate them immediately.
